pageContext.claim: “Through remittance, illegal aliens from Mexico are going to pay for the wall, that's what it is, 100%. Because when I say something, I mean it.”
pageContext.analysis: Mexico has refused to pay for Trump's wall. Trump suggests the cash remittances migrants send back to Mexico could be used to pay for the wall, but he doesn't explain how that would work, and the idea makes no sense on its face.
